We Build Landmarks!

Apartment

Independent Building

Duplex Villa

Thoughtfully designed, excellence through experience, optimally priced and placed in desired location off New By Pass Road, NH5, Kothapatnam Road, Ongole by us. We provide all features that a modern property buyer would wish to have. These properties are well connected to near by localities by wide roads and national highway NH5. Residents of this locality have easy access to community facilities like bus stand(Kothapatnam bus stand), railway station, schools(Minutes away from Nextgen international school), roads(600 meters to 6 lane new by pass road), corporate colleges, banks, hospitals etc.

Specifications

We can always upgrade according to your needs.

Structure

R.C.C. pile foundation with AAC blocks(Light weight bricks)/Clay bricks in cement mortar

Flooring

Vitrified tiles in hall, dining, bedrooms and kitchen. Ceramic tiles in utility/wash area, toilets and balconies

Doors

Teak wood frames having good quality of flush doors with hardware fittings for both main and internal doors

Windows

Reputed make UPVC sliding windows fitted with iron grills and glass

Kitchen

Granite top platform and stainless steel sink. Provision for fixing water purifier, exhaust fan and chimney

Toilets

Each toilet will have one wash basin EWC/WC, shower point, glazed tiles up to 7' height for walls and CP fittings

Painting

Putty for internal walls, exterior emulsion for external wall, plastic emulsion for ceiling and enamel paint(2 coatings) for doors

Electrical

Concealed copper wiring in modular switches.Adequate fan, tv, telephone points and 15A/5A power plugs

Roads

Black top roads as per R&B specifications/CC roads

Plantation

Planting trees along the road sides covering the entire avenue

Water

Municipal water provision, water sump and water tank up to 1000 litres capacity to individual house

Sewage

Underground drainage line and septic tank to individual house

Floor Plans

These are sample plans. We can always customize according to your needs.
